title: DeSantis-Stacked Medical Boards Ramp Up Bans on Care for Trans Youth
description:
Last Friday’s public hearing featured impassioned pleas from trans kids, who stand to lose access to lifesaving care in Florida.

The post DeSantis-Stacked Medical Boards Ramp Up Bans on Care for Trans Youth appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Whistleblowers Take Note: Don’t Trust Cropping Tools
description:
Cropping tools like those in Google Docs allow viewers to see the full, original images.

The post Whistleblowers Take Note: Don’t Trust Cropping Tools appeared first on The Intercept.
